text: Na sayanagatassa agilānassa dhammaṃ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā
edit: Na sayanagatassa agilānassa dhammaṃ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā

translations.transtext: 64. I will not teach Dhamma to a person lying down who is not ill: a training to be observed.
๖๔. พึงทำศึกษาว่า “เราจักไม่แสดงธรรมแก่บุคคลไม่ใช่ผู้เจ็บไข้อยู่บนที่นอน”
64. I shall not teach Dhamma to one on a couch who is not sick: this is a training to be done.
